{{Infobox Berry |name = #56 Jaboca |image = [[File:Jaboca.png]] |caption = The cluster of drupelets that make up this Berry pop rhythmically if the Berry is handled roughly. The sound of these Berries attracts wild Pok√©mon. |growtime = 9h 18m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,800 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *40 bitter *10 sour }} == Description == '''Jaboca''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of bitter on the field. The [[Durin]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 12 mins || 2 hours 12 mins || 4 hours 36 mins || 9 hours 18 mins - 18 hours 36 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:JabocaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:JabocaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:JabocaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 9 hours 18 mins -
18 hours 36 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 6 hours 12 mins -
12 hours 24 mins || 75 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 4 hours 8 mins -
8 hours 16 mins || 50 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Jaboca berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Durin.png|30px]]
